title: ‘It Was Bad Luck’: Matteo Jorgenson Brushes Off Tour de France Crash Scare
content:
Visma-Lease a Bike star escapes pothole fall with abrasions; believes confident team can look to win their third Tour de France.

Read the full article at ‘It Was Bad Luck’: Matteo Jorgenson Brushes Off Tour de France Crash Scare on Velo.
author: Andy McGrath
